definition: (archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: A soft silvery metallic element a rare earth of the lanthanide series it occurs in gadolinite monazite xenotime.
sentences.chinese: 一種軟銀色稀土屬金屬元素見於硅鈹釔獨居石磷釔中。
